at first ,thanks for your great job.

i am using Gmap.net in my project but i had the following problem

 1-after running  the project(.exe) ,

2- if i close  the application the debugging operation dosen't stop

i think the problem is that Gmap.net instance keep it's internet connection so that exiting the program dosen't finish the task;
there is no problem, tiles you downloaded are being cached in the background
but after closing the program it still running and when i check the task manager it still exist?

when i check the task managet it shouldn't be there after closing the App

 

when i set the MapType to None

the problem solved(no internet connection)

put to any other type the connection still on even after closing the app

 

thanks in advance

yes it should, it caches your downloaded tiles, if you somehow do not want that call map.Manager.CancelTileCaching(); on form close event, and you loose your data, so next time program again downloads the same tiles, no quick launch ;}

i need the map for a short time to get some coordinates andareas informations so no problem if my program download it again

i am running a WPF projest

where i found the

map.Manager.CancelTileCaching();

 

thankes a lot for your reply
